data.message: The TOYS MAKING I.M.P.A.C.T.S COMMUNITY CHRISTMAS PARTY WITH SANTA will be on Saturday, December 19, 2015, 4pm to 8pm at the Tower Center Mall located at 15400 Grand River Avenue, Detroit MI.  218 children (ages: newborn to 14 years old) are registered to receive your donations as Christmas gifts at this event.  Please donate a toy, winter coat, hat, scarf or gloves today. Monetary gifts are welcomed. Thank you for helping us make I.M.P.A.C.T.S -  "INTELLIGENT, MOTIVATED, POSITIVE ATTITUDES CHANGING THE STATISTICS"  Sponsors/Vendors can call and leave your contact information at (313) 878-1965.  HAPPY HOLIDAY!
